text:
Kodi Smit-McPhee (born 13 June 1996) is an Australian actor. He is known for his roles as The Boy in "The Road", Owen in "Let Me In", Norman Babcock in "ParaNorman", Alexander in "Dawn of the Planet of the Apes" and as Nightcrawler in ' and "Dark Phoenix".
Smit-McPhee was born in Adelaide, South Australia. His older sister is actress and singer Sianoa Smit-McPhee.

annotations.surface_form: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
